movies.title: Avengers
movies.cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth, Jeremy Renner, Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L. Jackson
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes, including Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, and Hulk, team up to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from conquering Earth.

movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.cast: Cillian Murphy, Robert Downey Jr., Emily Blunt, Matt Damon, Florence Pugh, Kenneth Branagh, Rami Malek
movies.description: A biographical drama about J. Robert Oppenheimer, the theoretical physicist who played a pivotal role in developing the atomic bomb during World War II.

movies.title: Ocean’s Eleven
movies.cast: George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Julia Roberts, Andy García, Don Cheadle
movies.description: A charismatic thief, Danny Ocean, assembles a team of con artists to pull off an elaborate heist on three Las Vegas casinos in a single night.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine, Gary Oldman, Morgan Freeman, Maggie Gyllenhaal
movies.description: Batman faces his greatest challenge yet as the Joker unleashes chaos upon Gotham, forcing him to confront moral dilemmas and the cost of being a hero.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Scarlett Johansson, Chris Hemsworth, Jeremy Renner, Paul Rudd, Brie Larson, Josh Brolin
movies.description: The surviving Avengers embark on a desperate mission to reverse Thanos' devastating snap and restore balance to the universe.

movies.title: Inception
movies.cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Tom Hardy, Ellen Page, Ken Watanabe, Cillian Murphy, Michael Caine, Marion Cotillard
movies.description: A skilled thief who specializes in entering people's dreams to steal secrets is given a seemingly impossible task: implanting an idea into a target's mind.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.cast: Christian Bale, Hugh Jackman, Michael Caine, Scarlett Johansson, Rebecca Hall, Andy Serkis, David Bowie
movies.description: Two rival magicians engage in an escalating battle of wits and deception in their quest to create the ultimate illusion.

movies.title: Iron Man
movies.cast: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Jeff Bridges, Terrence Howard, Jon Favreau, Shaun Toub
movies.description: Billionaire genius Tony Stark builds a high-tech armored suit after being held captive and becomes the superhero Iron Man.

movies.title: Dunkirk
movies.cast: Fionn Whitehead, Tom Hardy, Kenneth Branagh, Cillian Murphy, Mark Rylance, Harry Styles
movies.description: A gripping World War II drama that follows the harrowing evacuation of Allied soldiers from the beaches of Dunkirk as they face overwhelming enemy forces.

movies.title: Tenet
movies.cast: John David Washington, Robert Pattinson, Elizabeth Debicki, Kenneth Branagh, Michael Caine, Dimple Kapadia
movies.description: A secret agent embarks on a time-bending mission to prevent World War III, unraveling the mysterious technology of 'inversion.'
